title: Himitsu no Okusuri
description:
1-4: Himitsu no Okusuri
Taku and Mutsuki are childhood friends who no longer talk as much as they used to, because Mutsuki gave Taku a brush-off. A year later when their parents go on vacation and Mutsuki is left to look after Taku, Mutsuki slips Taku a few mysterious pills that put him in a compromising mood.

5-6: Minto na Kimochi
Hakka comes home early from school and catches Kunihiko having sex with some girl he picked up randomly.

7: Okusuri no Kawarini
Taku is sick for real and dreads taking his medication.
